name: Cypress College Swap Meet
description: Join us every weekend for an open-air market featuring antiques, crafts, food vendors, and more!

name: Los Alamitos Race Course
description: Experience live horse racing—from quarter horses to thoroughbreds—at one of California's only tracks with multiple million-dollar stakes races.

name: Seal Beach Navy Golf Course
description: 9-Hole Cruiser and 18-Hole Destroyer courses with novelty naval decor and ships on the fairways.

name: Cypress College
description: Enjoy striking, space-age architecture along with art exhibitions, student theater and film festivals

name: San Gabriel River Bike Trail
address: Access via River's End Park, Seal Beach, CA 90740
description: Ride along scenic trails from Cypress all the way down to Seal Beach. Ideal for biking, jogging, or a leisurely nature walk.

name: Seal Beach & Pier
address: Main St & Ocean Ave, Seal Beach, CA 90740
description: Just 15 minutes away, this charming coastal town offers beach time, surfing lessons, a laid-back pier, historic architecture, and the nearby salt marsh nature reserve.

name: Knott's Berry Farm & Soak City
description: Unleash thrills at Knott's Berry Farm amusement park or beat the heat with Soak City Water Park's wave pool and slides.

name: St. Isidore Historical Plaza
description: This picturesque plaza features mission-revival architecture, evening food truck events, wine, and live community vibes under string lights.

name: Rancho Los Alamitos Historic Ranch & Gardens
address: 6400 E Bixby Hill Rd, Long Beach, CA 90815
description: Historic ranch house, heritage gardens, farm animals, and interpretive tours—great for history buffs and families.

name: Cypress Community Civic Center
cost: Free or small entry fees ($5-20) depending on event
description: Enjoy events like the Cypress Community Festival (summer), outdoor concerts, markets, and community sports.
